contentBlocks.title: General Fan Requirements
paragraphs: Ceiling fans must be permanently installed.
Ceiling fans must have a speed controller.

contentBlocks.title: Climate Zones 1, 2, and 3 Requirements
paragraphs: Ceiling fans must be installed in bedrooms according to Table J3D4.
Ceiling fans must be installed in habitable rooms other than bedrooms according to Table J3D4.

contentBlocks.title: Climate Zone 5 Requirements (NSW and Qld only)
paragraphs: Ceiling fans must be installed in habitable rooms other than bedrooms according to Table J3D4.

contentBlocks.title: Table J3D4: Minimum ceiling fan requirements in climate zones 1, 2, 3 and 5
headers: Minimum number and diameter (mm) of ceiling fans required for a bedroom in climate zones 1, 2 and 3
